review: This is my first foray into a streaming device on my tv, but so far I'm more disappointed than excited.  The bandwidth requirements are higher than my 6MB cable internet connection has in order to stream something from Amazon or Netflix, but the Netflix service works uninterrupted and lag free on my blu-ray player.  Additionally I'm disappointed in the Amazon Prime costs for programming that are on top of the Prime membership costs.I'll keep trying and see if I can find a way to integrate this into my life, but I'm far from loving it.  The kids use it more and even then, its only for games, not TV.
author: Timothy A. Doyle
